title-group.article-title: COMPUTING THE TORSION OF THE ùíë-RAMIFIED MODULE OF A NUMBER FIELD

abstract.p: We fix a prime number p and a number field K, and denote by M the maximal abelian p-extension of K unramified outside p. Our aim is to study the ‚Ñ§p-module ùñÉ = Gal(M/K) and to give a method to effectively compute its structure as a ‚Ñ§p-module. We also give numerical results, for real quadratic fields, cubic fields and quintic fields, together with their interpretations via Cohen-Lenstra heuristics.
